title: Malacca Heritage Mansion Stay with Decadent Afternoon Tea
description:
Experience old-world elegance and timeless opulence at The Majestic Malacca, a beautifully restored 1920s mansion and member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Steeped in history and located in the UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Malacca, this boutique hotel invites you to discover the beauty of this 600-year-old coastal port city, before returning to the five-star grandeur hidden within the beguiling mansion’s walls.

Enjoy a stay worthy of its former tycoon owner with daily à la carte breakfast, one afternoon tea for two served in the Library and a guaranteed 3pm late checkout.
offer_address: 188, Jalan Bunga Raya, Melaka, 75100 Melaka, Malaysia

title: Malacca Five-Star Heritage Mansion Stay
description:
Experience old-world elegance and timeless opulence at The Majestic Malacca, a beautifully restored 1920s mansion and member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World group. Steeped in history in the UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Malacca, this boutique hotel invites you to discover the beauty of this 600-year-old coastal port city, before returning to the five-star grandeur hidden within the walls of this beguiling mansion.

Pull up a seat at the mansion’s European-style saloon bar and sip a glass of whiskey neat, sink into the leather-bound chairs of The Lounge at The Mansion, curl up with a good book in the light-filled Library, and let the rare Malaccan cultural delicacies of The Mansion restaurant transport you on a culinary journey.
offer_address: 188, Jalan Bunga Raya, Melaka, 75100 Melaka, Malaysia
